h2_title: Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide
content: At this point, he'll no longer use his sword, focusing entirely on his electric fists and tail, and somehow dealing even more damage in the process. To make matters worse, he'll massively reduce your maximum stamina while in this golden dome.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hundred-Eyed_Daoist_Master.md', within the main section titled 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master', specifically from the subsection 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
At this point, he'll no longer use his sword, focusing entirely on his electric fists and tail, and somehow dealing even more damage in the process. To make matters worse, he'll massively reduce your maximum stamina while in this golden dome.
